io.github.icrazyblaze.twitchmod.chat

Class ChatCommands

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.github.icrazyblaze.twitchmod.chat.ChatCommands

  • public class ChatCommands
extends java.lang.Object
    This class is where all the commands are registered for use in ChatPicker.
    See Also:
    ChatPicker

      static void initDynamicCommands(java.lang.String argString, java.lang.String sender)

    • Method Detail

      • registerCommand

        public static void registerCommand(java.lang.Runnable runnable,
                                   java.lang.String... keys)
        Adds a command to a list that ChatPicker checks. The registerCommand method takes two arguments: a runnable, and any number of command aliases. 
         
     registerCommand(() -> CommandHandlers.myCommand(), "mycommand", "mycommandalias");
        If an entry with the same runnable or alias already exists, it will be replaced. IDEA will swap the lambda for a method reference wherever possible.
        Parameters:
        runnable - The function linked to the command
        keys - Aliases for the command
        See Also:
        ChatPicker

      • initCommands

        public static void initCommands()
        Commands are registered here from doCommands.

      • initDynamicCommands

        public static void initDynamicCommands(java.lang.String argString,
                                       java.lang.String sender)
        Commands that are registered here need to be re-added to the command registry every time they run because they have changing ("dynamic") elements.
        Parameters:
        argString - the argument for the command
        sender - the name of the command sender

      • getRegisteredCommands

        public static java.util.List<java.lang.String> getRegisteredCommands()
